alerts.description:
The expected weather will bring a situation of extreme heat stress. (level 3 of 3)
Height range: < 200 m

The expected weather will bring a situation of strong heat stress. (level 1 of 3)
Height range: < 800 m

There is a risk of heavy thunderstorms with heavy rain (level 2 of 4).
Max. gusts: ~ 60 km/h; Precipitation amounts: < 25 l/m²/1h; Hail: small grains
